title: In Memory Of Lorin Maazel, The Maestro Behind The Castleton Festival
teaser: World-renowned conductor Lorin Maazel died Sunday at his home in Castleton, Va. He was 84. Robert Siegel spoke with Maazel about his life and career in 2009.
